name: 3SD Hazies
author: itsyoboyeden
notes:
Still on that Hazy wave after the tourney wins. Very easy road to KOG, econ deals with bs like CA and Bamboo trash.
Missed MCS last month because I stayed in legend to test, so this month I knew I was gonna hit KOG right away. 
Would be too difficult to hit KOG with Aroma Strat with all the CA and Ninjas going around.
Hazy -> tier 1 after ban list & skills rebalancing imo
